availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joseph Hamilton Barnes (Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Weaver Barnes and Elizabeth Barnes. Married to Dorcas Jane Miller Barnes in Ohio County, Kentucky, on April 23, 1840. Father of Richard W. Barnes, Dorcas E. Barnes, Joseph A. Barnes, Helen A. Barnes, Heartwell T. Barnes, Downard F. Barnes, and David H. Barnes. Farmer in Ohio County in 1850. Farmer in Ohio County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, District 1, p. 46B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Hartford, p. 743.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Ohio County, Hartford, p. 474B-475A..
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Ohio County Marriages, Film #000494956, p. 77.
